meaningMnemonic: You have a <radical>thread</radical> <radical>hill</radical>, but the hill is a bit weird looking (take a look at the hill radical in this kanji). It's not any normal hill, it's a weird lumpy hill that isn't quite right. That's because it is a thread hill of <kanji>netting</kanji>, and parts of the nets have caught things, like fish and cats, so there's weird abnormal lumps in them.
readingMnemonic: There's so much <kanji>netting</kanji> that it's out of control. You decide to take your lawn mower to <reading>mow</reading> (もう) it all down.
